title: NETWORK POLICIES and NETWORK RULES views (Account Usage): New columns | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2024_06 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.
When this behavior change bundle is enabled, the SNOWFLAKE.ACCOUNT_USAGE.NETWORK_POLICIES and SNOWFLAKE.ACCOUNT_USAGE.NETWORK_RULES views include the following new columns:
The list of allowed IPv4 addresses and CIDR block ranges in the corresponding network policy.
The list of blocked IPv4 addresses and CIDR block ranges in the corresponding network policy.
The mode of the network rule. For supported values, see CREATE NETWORK RULE.
The type of network rule. For supported values, see CREATE NETWORK RULE.
The list of values for the network rule. For supported values, see CREATE NETWORK RULE.
These columns are added as the last columns, in order, for each view.
